2025-09-03.title: Speed Play
2025-09-03.details: Gentle pick-ups to feel fast again. Build from easy pace to about 5:00/km over 100m. Walk back for full recovery.

2025-09-04.title: Optional Easy Run
2025-09-04.details: Only if feeling good. Keep it conversational.

2025-09-05.title: First Tempo Run
2025-09-05.details: Build confidence at faster paces. 2-minute jog recovery between intervals.

2025-09-07.title: Recovery Run
2025-09-07.details: Keep it chatty and relaxed - active recovery only.

2025-09-08.title: Long Run Rebuild
2025-09-08.details: Focus on time on feet, not speed. Practice drinking during the run.

2025-09-10.title: Track Session
2025-09-10.details: Remind your legs what speed feels like. 90 seconds walking/jogging recovery.

2025-09-11.title: Optional Easy Run
2025-09-11.details: Optional recovery run if feeling good.

2025-09-12.title: Marathon Pace Run
2025-09-12.details: Should feel 'comfortably firm' - sustainable for ages.

2025-09-14.title: Easy Recovery
2025-09-14.description: 6km easy pace - keep those legs loose!

2025-09-15.title: Long Run with Finish
2025-09-15.details: Practice what race pace feels like when a bit tired.

2025-09-17.title: Longer Intervals
2025-09-17.details: Your hardest session - you've got this! 2 minutes recovery between each.

2025-09-19.title: Extended Tempo
2025-09-19.details: Build that lactate threshold - one continuous effort.

2025-09-21.title: Recovery Spin
2025-09-21.details: Think of this as a gentle leg loosener.

2025-09-22.title: Long Run Race Simulation
2025-09-22.description: 4km easy + 10km at half marathon pace + 4km easy
2025-09-22.details: Big confidence builder - you're running more than half the race distance at goal pace!

2025-09-24.title: Race Pace Repeats
2025-09-24.details: Make race pace feel natural and relaxed. 90 seconds easy jog recovery.

2025-09-26.title: Tempo Blocks
2025-09-26.details: Building strength at comfortably hard effort. 3 minutes easy between.

2025-09-29.title: Final Long Pace Practice
2025-09-29.details: Last big race pace practice - make it count!

2025-10-01.title: Speed Maintenance
2025-10-01.details: Keep legs sharp but don't tire them out. Full recovery between.

2025-10-02.title: Optional Easy Run
2025-10-02.details: Optional - skip entirely if feeling tired.

2025-10-03.title: Final Race Pace Hit
2025-10-03.details: Your last race pace session - trust your fitness!

2025-10-06.title: Reduced Long Run
2025-10-06.details: Maintain routine but reduce load. You should feel fresh and ready.

2025-10-08.title: Leg Sharpener
2025-10-08.details: Keep legs active but fresh. Practice race morning warm-up routine.

2025-10-12.title: üèÅ RACE DAY!
2025-10-12.details: Target pace: 5:41/km average. Start at 5:45-5:50/km for first 4km, settle into 5:38-5:42/km, finish strong!
